About_me: I am working within Shell Project & Technology in Rijswijk the Netherlands as an Automation Engineer specialized in Online Quality Measuring Instruments (analysers) and their system integration. In this capacity I work as a technical advisor on Quality Measuring Instruments and their system integration for both up and downstream assets as well as projects.I joined Shell as an experienced hire and previously worked with Imtech for 16 years fulfilling key technical positions and steering technical solutions in QMI projects as well as driving development of systems and products for the LNG business building a strong relation with Shell. Involved in development of the first CP/FP Automatic LNG sampler which is currently included in the new ISO 8943-2007, provided technical consultations for customers worldwide on LNG sampling, vaporizing and online quality measuring instruments. Outside of work, I like to go out for sailing on the Dutch lakes with the family. I am an enthusiastic cyclist as well as speed skater.
Ask_me_about: QMI & metering system integration and performance monitoring., QMI (online analysers) selection, and Analyser Systems.
